Flow.description: Moved File validation under Closed Won Path updated/added Closed Loss reasons, Competitor lost to & Added screen to require Billing Address information for closed won.

formulas.name: ImplementationCheck
formulas.expression: IF( AND( ISBLANK({!Integration_Status}), ISBLANK({!Migration_Status}) ), "Not Confirmed", CASE( {!Integration_Status} & "|" & {!Migration_Status}, "Confirmed|Confirmed", "Confirmed â€“ No Integrations or Data Migration Required", "Confirmed|Needs Review", "Confirmed Integrations", "Needs Review|Confirmed", "Confirmed Data Migration", "Needs Review|Needs Review", "Needs Review for Both", "Confirmed|", "Confirmed Integrations", "|Confirmed", "Confirmed Data Migration", "Not Confirmed" ) )
